pageTitle: NRS Men's Edge Kayak Splash Pants | Outdoorplay.com
textBeforeTable: NRS Men's Edge Kayak Splash Pants - Cold weather paddling just got a little warmer with the NRS Edge splash pants. There’s plenty of room for insulating layers and the wide cuffs with double closures seal easily over your boots. Highly breathable, super durable HyproTex fabric will keep you dry and comfortable for years to come, and Cordura armor on the seat and knees provides extra toughness in high-wear areas. The Edge Kayak pant’s 3" wide waistband has raw neoprene inside for extra grip, plus a double-pull waist cinch. The spacious straight-leg cut allows for extra layers underneath. Extra wide gusseted ankle cuffs leave room for cold water footwear, and an inner hook-and-loop ankle cuff cinches over your shoe top to keep out splash and debris. An outer hook-and-loop ankle cover doubles the splash protection. Keep the cold at bay with the NRS Edge kayaking splash pants. Sizing for NRS Edge Kayak Splash Pants: Price Match Guarantee Product Warranty Shipping info Easy returns Shopping Info 2 large pockets with splashproof zippers Gusseted crotch Double adjustable hook-and-loop ankle closures 3" terraprene neoprene band w/ double-pull adjustment Cordura reinforced seat and knees Waterproof & Breathable 70 x 320-denier ripstop HyproTex 2.5
